entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Terrace Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:16 p.m. EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
